nodes.text: Sakifwanna was a planet that was located within the Sakifwanna system in Hutt Space, a region of the galaxy controlled by the Hutt species. The planet lay on the Elgit–M'Hanna Corridor hyperlane that connected it to the worlds of Elgit and M'Hanna. A smaller hyperspace route linked Sakifwanna to the Cyax system, and another hyperlane connected the world to the planet of Saki.

Sakifwanna, which meant "Fourth Saki" in the Sakiyan language, was a colony world of the sentient Sakiyan species that was native to Saki. Sakifwanna served as a nursery world for the Sakiyan Collective, with Sakiyan shepherds breeding creatures for the repopulation of Saki's game preserves. The fate of Sakifwanna following the invasion of the Hutt Space by the extra-galactic Yuuzhan Vong species was unclear to the rest of the galaxy.
Sakifwanna was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the planet in grid square T-11.
